channel.title: Google play store and app store integration with Redash
channel.description: Hello Redash Community, I was creating a Dashboard and I want to get analytics about mobile app such as number of downloads over time, number of registered users .. etc but I can't find how can I integrate with google play or app store to be able to do that ? I can't find this integration in data sources can you help me with that please ? Thanks in advance

item.title: Google play store and app store integration with Redash
item.dc:creator: Eslam
item.description:
Hello Redash Community,
I was creating a Dashboard and I want to get analytics about mobile app such as number of downloads over time, number of registered users … etc
but I can’t find how can I integrate with google play or app store to be able to do that ? I can’t find this integration in data sources
can you help me with that please ?
Thanks in advance

Read full topic
item.source: Google play store and app store integration with Redash
